    <div class="section-wrapper-content-wrapper">
      <div class="content-border pager-offset"><h2 class = "black-bar-header">Most Recent News</h2><div class="view view-news-recent view-id-news_recent view-display-id-teaser view-dom-id-1faa2b17c2c99afaba05212f1b53a6c0">
        
  
  
      
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76645">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/na-lcs-week-9-wildturtle-vs-doublelift" title="NA LCS Week 9: Wildturtle vs Doublelift" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35752" class="file file-image file-image-png">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/screen_shot_2017-03-23_at_11.42.35_am.png?itok=DqKDd-_w" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/na-lcs-week-9-wildturtle-vs-doublelift">NA LCS Week 9: Wildturtle vs Doublelift</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Tune in Saturday at 12PM PDT for this ADC matchup. </div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76645">1 day ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76648">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/en/news/store/sales/march-early-sales-32417-32717" title="March Early Sales: 3.24.17 - 3.27.17" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35676" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/saleannouncebanner_march.2017.modified.en_.jpg?itok=bum-HTy6" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/en/news/store/sales/march-early-sales-32417-32717">March Early Sales: 3.24.17 - 3.27.17</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Baker and Star Guardian are some of the skins on the March Early Sale list!</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76648">1 day ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76533">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/en/news/riot-games/editorial/how-revive-dragon" title="How to Revive a Dragon" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35698" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/asol-header.jpg?itok=avltKvfa" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/en/news/riot-games/editorial/how-revive-dragon">How to Revive a Dragon</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Worlds 2016 and bringing Aurelion Sol back from the dead.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76533">1 day ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76532">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/2017-mid-season-invitational-tickets" title="2017 Mid-Season Invitational Tickets" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35674" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/msi-tickets-header_0.jpg?itok=wSB7KIQr" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/2017-mid-season-invitational-tickets">2017 Mid-Season Invitational Tickets</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">International players planning to attend the 2017 Mid-Season Invitational will be able to buy tickets starting on March 27 at 9:00 AM PT. </div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76532">1 day ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76381">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/en/news/community/q/monthly-q-ghostcrawler-0" title="Monthly Q&amp;A with Ghostcrawler" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35667" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/monthlyqa_1.jpg?itok=_hTnNL4P" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/en/news/community/q/monthly-q-ghostcrawler-0">Monthly Q&amp;A with Ghostcrawler</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Game Design Director Ghostcrawler answers your questions about League, live on Caffeine.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76381">2 days ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>

<body id="tudosobre">
<div id="doc" class="grid-1055">

        
            
            <div id="cabecalho">
                
<div class="glb-bloco">
    <div class="glb-grid-12">
        
            
<style type="text/css">.regua-navegacao,.regua-navegacao-tab,.has-regua .barra-globocom{display:none}.regua-svg-container{height:0;width:0;position:absolute;left:-999999999px}</style><div id="regua-svg-container" class="regua-svg-container"><!-- default:svg --><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><symbol id="eixo-icone-busca" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M21.67 15.09c0 .5-.45.91-1 .91s-1-.41-1-.91V9.15h2v9.09zm18 .91H6v-14h16v14z"/><path d="M17 14.15c0 .55-.45 1-1 1h-6c-.55 0-1-.45-1-1s.45-1 1-1h6c.55 0 1 .45 1 1zm2-4c0 .55-.45 1-1 1h-8c-.55 0-1-.45-1-1s.45-1 1-1h8c.55 0 1 .45 1 1z"/><path d="M17 14.15c0 .55-.45 1-1 1h-6c-.55 0-1-.45-1-1s.45-1 1-1h6c.55 0 1 .45 1 1zm2-4c0 .55-.45 1-1 1h-8c-.55 0-1-.45-1-1s.45-1 1-1h8c.55 0 1 .45 1 a(o):(m=s(e,n))?(y&&"function"==typeof y&&y(m),f="undefined"!=typeof XDomainRequest&&m instanceof XDomainRequest,m.onload||(m.onload=function(e){return function(){var n;return p&&clearTimeout(p),n=f||m.status>=200&&m.status<400,n?(o=m.responseText,g&&(o=JSON.parse(o)),e.complete(o,d,i,h,g,a)):(console.error("AjaxCache Request Error",m.status,m.responseText),c(m.status,m))}}(this)),m.onerror||(m.onerror=function(){return console.error("AjaxCache Request Error",m.status,m.responseText),c(m.status,m)}),"GET"!==e&&l?(w&&(l=JSON.stringify(l)),f?setTimeout(function(){return m.send(l)},0):m.send(l)):f?setTimeout(function(){return m.send()},0):m.send(),b&&(r=function(){return null!=m.abort?m.abort():void 0},p=setTimeout(r,b)),m):(console.error("AjaxCache Request Error","This browser does not support this operation"),c("500",m),m)},e.prototype.getJsonp=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,c,l,u;return i=null!=n.expire&&n.expire>=0?n.expire:60,r=n.success||function(){},o=n.key||e,u=n.skipCache,c=!0,s="ajaxCacheJsonp"+this.jsonpId++,(t=this.getCache(o,u,c))?void r(t):(window[s]=function(e){return function(n){return e.complete(n,i,o,u,c,r)}}(this),e+=-1===e.indexOf("?")?"?callback="+s:"&callback="+s,l=a(s),l.src=e,void f.appendChild(l))},e.prototype.get=function(e,n){return this.request("GET",e,n)},e.prototype.post=function(e,n){return this.request("POST",e,n)},e}(),window.ajaxCache=new o,r=function(){function e(){}return e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>


        
    </div>
</div>

            </div>
        


    <div id="corpo">
        <div id="conteudo">
            
    
    




    
        

<style>
.tudosobre-container.fotao .cover-container{
     background-image:url(http://s2.glbimg.com/uhRevSIMu3TrVR8Is1ET8_JJ6xc=/1500x470/s2.glbimg.com/f3MbQzbkYJ5Qocqqj37T0aYUlKI=/727x0:2386x1105/1500x1000/s.glbimg.com/po/tt2/f/original/2016/01/27/oculus.png);
     background-position: center center; 
     background-repeat: no-repeat;
}
</style>


<div class="tudosobre-container  fotao" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Product">
    <div class="cover-container">
      <div class="area-cover">

			<div class="glb-share share-bar" data-url="http://www.techtudo.com.br/tudo-sobre/oculus-rift.html" data-title="Oculus Rift #techtudo"></div>

<div class="widget-media">
    <div class="label-opiniao">OPINIÃO DOS USUÁRIOS</div>
    <div class="media-topico"></div>
    <div class="total-opinioes" ></div>
</div>

<script>
    
    $(function(){

        var editoria = "", idExterno = "";
        try{
            editoria = eval('OPINIAO_EDITORIA');
            idExterno = eval('OPINIAO_ID_EXTERNO');
        } catch (err){}
        editoria = editoria.replace(/\//g, '%40%40');
        idExterno = idExterno.replace(/\//g, '%40%40');

        var url =  window.location.href.split('?')[0];
        var title = document.title;

        $('.widget-media').mediaOpinioes({
               uri: editoria,
               idExterno: idExterno,
               url: url,
               titulo: title,
               images_path: "http://s.glbimg.com/po/tt2/widget_media_opiniao/img/",
               url_api: "http://comentarios.globo.com/static/opiniao/js/opiniao.api.js"
        });
    })

</script>
    


<div class="container ad-wide">
    
</div>

<div class="body-container">
    
        <div class="area-primaria">
            
                


<script>
var altura_leia_mais = 400;
</script>
<div id="widget-descricao-entidade" class="widget-descricao-entidade box primary">
    <article itemprop="description">
        <h2 class="titulo-descricao sem-titulo-especifico">Descrição</h2>
        
        <div class="corpo-descricao">
            O Oculus Rift é um óculos de realidade virtual aumentada, voltado para quem curte games, desenvolvido pela Oculus VR, empresa comprada pelo Facebook por R$ 2 milhões. O primeiro kit foi financiado pelo site colaborativo Kickstarter e tinha tela de LCD de 7 polegadas com resolução de 640×800 por olho. A nova geração do Development Kit (DK2), lançada em 2014, trouxe algumas melhorias, como o uso de um display de OLED de baixa persistência com o dobro da qualidade (são 960×1080 pixels por olho) e um acessório extra para aprimorar o rastreamento de posição. A versão final do Oculus Rift teve a pré-venda em janeiro de 2016 e os produtos começarão a ser entregues em março. O primeiro lote foi lançado pelo preço de US$ 599 (cerca de R$ 2.400). A data de chegada ao Brasil e o valor ainda não foram divulgados. O kit de desenvolvimento do Crescent Bay – o último protótipo revelado – está disponível para compra pelo preço de US$ 350 (R$ 1.066). Na caixa do Rift, o usuário que comprar encontra o headset com fones de ouvido e microfone embutido, uma câmera de monitoramente, controle de Xbox One e o Oculus Remote, controle que torna experiência VR mais intuitiva. Um dos concorrentes do aparelho é o PlayStation VR, óculos da Sony para PS4.

            
        </div>
    </article>
    <div class="container-leia-mais">
        <a class="leia-mais gui-color-primary-link cor-produto" href="#">LEIA MAIS</a>
    </div>
</div>

0 -2px 0 0 rgba(0,0,0,.2);margin-top:16px;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase}.load-more a{color:#fff;display:block;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;font-size:14px;font-weight:700;padding:15px 0}.post-notifier-pushstream{display:none}@media .time{color:#999;margin-bottom:4px}.highlight-bastian-feed .text{margin-bottom:4px;color:#333}}</style><div class="feed-root"><div id="feed-placeholder" class="feed-placeholder"><div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Eletrônicos</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 1 ano</span></span></div><a href="http://www.techtudo.com.br/listas/noticia/2016/01/conheca-os-oculos-de-realidade-virtual-mais-esperados-para-2016.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Conheça os óculos de realidade virtual mais esperados para 2016</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">HTC Vive, Oculus Rift e Playstation VR são os grandes lançamentos para 2016. 2016","url":"http://www.techtudo.com.br/listas/noticia/2016/01/conheca-os-oculos-de-realidade-virtual-mais-esperados-para-2016.html"},"created":"2016-01-13T07:00:07-0200","feedId":"15f8df29-299c-4f1f-82a8-b74ba9af369b","id":"25bb6bc958d877acf32602339af7f3c5","lastPublication":"2016-01-13T07:00:07-0200","modified":"2016-01-13T07:00:07-0200","publication":"2016-01-13T07:00:07-0200","tenantId":"techtudo","type":"materia"},{"age":38316146,"content":{"chapeu":{"label":"Eletrônicos","url":"http://www.techtudo.com.br/eletronicos/"},"image":{"cropOptions":{},"sizes":{"L":{"height":608,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/ytSomlcdxswEW5Wa1LYHtj5GDBU=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/po/tt2/f/original/2016/01/07/oculus-rift-5.jpg","width":1080},"M":{"height":456,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/HakIWMhgDcytGOw8zjausLno7xY=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/po/tt2/f/original/2016/01/07/oculus-rift-5.jpg","width":810},"S":{"height":304,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/bnfSco4VUQFLP68D5l18fdbuUlw=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/po/tt2/f/original/2016/01/07/oculus-rift-5.jpg","width":540},"V":{"height":620,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/VvswMlkPUAb0kkqwzAjkSvilNXU=/570x620/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/po/tt2/f/original/2016/01/07/oculus-rift-5.jpg","width":570}},"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/ap8dJb0MfUCPFtnqbqmqbS5U_zY=/90x68/s.glbimg.com/po/tt2/f/original/2016/01/07/oculus-rift-5.jpg"},"summary":"Óculos de realidade virtual tem especificações mínimas para rodar no PC.","title":"Oculus Rift: veja se PC é compatível com os óculos de realidade virtual","url":"http://www.techtudo.com.br/dicas-e-tutoriais/noticia/2016/01/oculus-rift-veja-se-pc-e-compativel-com-os-oculos-de-realidade-virtual.html"},"created":"2016-01-07T16:11:54-0200","feedId":"15f8df29-299c-4f1f-82a8-b74ba9af369b","id":"f62d868adcaa8dc61279d148f3265404","lastPublication":"2016-01-07T16:11:54-0200","modified":"2016-01-07T16:11:54-0200","publication":"2016-01-07T16:11:54-0200","tenantId":"techtudo","type":"materia"}],"limit":10,"nextPage":2,"referer":"/tudo-sobre/oculus-rift.html"})}f=b.querySelector('.areatemplate-esquerda'),f&&(f.classList.remove(c+'-20',c+'-offset-2'),g=f.parentNode.classList,g.remove('small-'+d,c+'-un'+d),g.add(c+'-'+d,'large-un'+d));var     <div class="glbOpiniao-nota-wrapper">

    <div class="glbOpiniao-form-wrapper">
    <h3>Opinião dos usuários</h3>
<p class="glbOpiniao-disclaimer">
    Os comentários são de responsabilidade exclusiva de seus autores e não representam a opinião deste site. Se achar algo que viole os
    <a class="glbOpiniao-main-color glbComentarios-link" id="glbComentarios-termo" href="https://login.globo.com/termosUso/6224" target="_blank">termos de uso</a>, denuncie. Leia as <a class="glbOpiniao-main-color glbComentarios-link" id="glbComentarios-perguntas" href="http://ajudacomentarios.globo.com" target="_blank">perguntas mais frequentes</a> para saber o que é impróprio ou ilegal.
</p>

    <div class="widget-opiniao-lateral">
        <div class="sem-comentario">
            <div class="titulo">
                <span class="estrelas"></span>
                <h3>Opinião dos usuários</h3>
            </div>
            <div class="rodape">
                <a href="#"> Diz ai, qual foi sua opinião? </a>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="com-comentario" style="display: none">
            <div class="titulo">
                <h3>Opinião da galera</h3>
                <div class="media-opinioes">
                    <div class="estrelas"></div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="opiniao">
                <img class="avatar-autor" src=""/>
                <div class="texto-opiniao">
                    <h4></h4>
                    <span class="estrelas"></span>
                    <p></p>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="rodape">
                <a href="#"> Qual a sua opinião? </a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        $(function(){

            var editoria = '',
                idExterno = '';
            try {
                editoria = eval('OPINIAO_EDITORIA');
                idExterno = eval('OPINIAO_ID_EXTERNO');
            } catch (err){}
            editoria = editoria.replace(/\//g, '%40%40');
            idExterno = idExterno.replace(/\//g, '%40%40');

            $('.widget-opiniao-lateral').opiniaoGalera({
                   uri: editoria,
                   idExterno: idExterno,
                   url: window.location.href.split('?')[0],
                   titulo: document.title,
                   images_path: "http://s.glbimg.com/po/tt2/widget_review_entidade/img/",
                   url_api: "http://comentarios.globo.com/static/opiniao/js/opiniao.api.js"
            });
        })
    </script>
    
</div>

        </div>

        <div id="glb-shopping-widget-3892523a-4c11-4c18-8b86-bcd90a92ee2c" class="widget-shopping globoshopping" data-url="http://vitrines.globo.com/vitrine/vitrine.min.js" data-sitepage="techtudo/home" data-responsive="on" data-branding-color="fc8800"></div>

    <script src="http://comentarios.globo.com/static/opiniao/js/opiniao.all.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
    	var OPINIAO_EDITORIA = 'techtudo@@tudo-sobre';
    	var OPINIAO_ID_EXTERNO = 'oculus-rift';

        var jq211 = $;
        if( !$.fn.TECHTUDO_JQUERY_VERSION ){
            jq211 = jQuery.noConflict( true );
        }



        jq211( function(){
            (function($){
                $("#widget-opiniao").opiniaoUsuario({
                    uri: OPINIAO_EDITORIA,
                    idExterno: OPINIAO_ID_EXTERNO,
                    url: window.location.href.split('?')[0],
                    titulo: 'Oculus Rift',
                    shortUrl: "none"
                });
            })(jq211);
        });

    </script>
    


        </div>

</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    head(function() {
        (function($) {
            $("#busca-padrao").buscaPadrao({
                url: "http://www.techtudo.com.br/busca/",
                produto: "techtudo",
                site: "TechTudo",
                suggest_ligado: true,
                msg_busca_fixa: "no TechTudo"
            });
            csrfToken.insere();
        })(jQuery);
    });
</script>
